scripts.build: del dist && mkdir dist && npm run browserify
scripts.jsdoc: del docs/api/$npm_package_version/ && mkdir -p docs/api/$npm_package_version/ && jsdoc --destination docs/api/$npm_package_version/ --verbose --recurse src/
scripts.gh-pages: del docs/app && mkdir -p docs/app && cp -r index.html dist docs/app
